content.rendered:
Tammy Lanius

Agile Coach and Product Manager

Tammy Lanius brings over two decades of technical and Agile experience supporting teams across a wide variety of industries – Defense, Financial Services, Health and Education. She is passionate about working with organizations and teams to strengthen and empower them to reach their full potential. Tammy’s high energy style enables her to build strong relationships and establish a solid foundation for Agile teams to flourish. With a broad professional background including QA Analyst, Test Management, DevOps leadership, Senior Scrum Master and Agile Coach, Tammy uses her knowledge base to improve the productivity of the teams without sacrificing quality. 

Contact Me
